ygData.subject: Re: Mipmapping question
ygData.msgSnippet: 1 problem guys... I can t work on Tuesday mornings.  I play.... er., work Wednesday thru Monday and Tuesday evenings, yes, including Saturdays and Sundays, can
ygData.messageBody:
1 problem guys... I can't work on Tuesday mornings. I play.... er., work
Wednesday thru Monday and Tuesday evenings, yes, including Saturdays and
Sundays, can I please have 6 hours off on a Tuesday morning to play with my
kids?!

My voicemail: Hi, you've reached Telethorn/Zarbon, I will not be in the
office today as I am at a client site. If you need to reach me, you can
page me at /t Zarbon, or you can try me at /t Telethorn. If this is an
emergency, please contact that guy that has no specific job definition, he
may be able to help you. Thanks and have a nice day. *beeeeeep*

----- Original Message -----
From: Cory Burns
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 1:18 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Mipmapping question


From: "Cory Burns" <coryb@...>


LOL that's good. "Hey so what is it you do again".

"I don't know lets ask....."

Of course this time frame of Tuesday may be pushed do to the, moving of
pa..... Do to the unexpected errors that seem to arise on Tuesday mornings.
-----Original Message-----
From: Dicey [mailto:shonn@...]
Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 1:20 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Mipmapping question


From: "Dicey" <shonn@...>


The best time to reach our representatives would be Tuesday morning. Patch
time will be...um, I mean they will be available for about 6 hours.

I want to be the guy that nobody knows what his job is.

-----Original Message-----
From: Cory Burns [mailto:coryb@...]
Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 11:06 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Mipmapping question


From: "Cory Burns" <coryb@...>


Ok you got "that Guy". I'll be the Guy that goes "I don't know this
lets call........." hehe.

Also
Answering Service: Thank you for calling Everquest ISP all our
representatives are busy right now. We have members out some
are dealing with a Cazic Thule and we have other that are trying to
fix an OOT problem, please call back later and someone,
may be available
